content: Eh?! Why does the rice look so weak 'n' scraggy... {A灵光一现}Did you forget to water it properly mah~? It's okay, don't give up! It's still edible even if it's malnourished.
info: 种植1阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: Look what I've got! I also managed to grow some new crops. Some <style=Highlight>tomatoes</style>... and <style=Highlight>wheat</style>! Two successful harvests—isn't that a nice little surprise mah~?
info: 种植1阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A想象}When you plant some lickle crops <style=Highlight>together</style>, they can share nutrients and keep pests away too, and that makes it easier to grow <style=Highlight>high‑quality variant crops</style>. Would ya like to give it a try?
info: 种植1阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: Take these <style=Highlight>tomato seed packets</style> and <style=Highlight>wheat seed packets</style>. Try <style=Highlight>plantin' 'em together</style> in lickle groups... and don't forget to <style=Highlight>water</style> 'em, alright? Remember...
info: 种植1阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A灵光一现}Oh, I nearly forgot... Gran'mama made this here <style=Highlight>scarecrow</style> for me. It can help track how the field's doin'. Maybe try settin' it by your crops too?
info: 种植1阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A惊叹}O' Skies Above~! You've grown such wonderful rice stalks! I just knew you had amaaaazing talent!
info: 种植1阶段-云果_主流程文本3
